description: Fuzzy-assed Mark Evrett is on all fours with his ass in the air as Kevin Scott's well-schooled fist pushes in. Mark gets on his back and takes Scott's greasy forearm long and deep, offering the camera a long look at his cream-ringed rosebud. Next he shows off his athletic prowess by fisting himself before spreading his legs for another session with Scott's elbow.
title: Fist for Hire 2, Scene #01
